required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Trial to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics Effect of Rifampicin on Famitinib
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Center, Single Arm, Open and Fixed Sequence Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetic Effects of Rifampicin on Famitinib in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study was to assess the effect of repeated oral doses of Rifampicin on the pharmacokinetic profile of a single dose of Famitinib.
The secondary objective of the study was to assess the safety of Famitinib given alone versus Famitinib co-administered with Rifampicin.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Repeated oral doses of Rifampicin on the pharmacokinetic profile of a single dose of Famitinib.

secondary_outcome.measure: incidence of adverse events/serious adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from ICF signing date to approximate Day 31
secondary_outcome.description: safety evaluation based on NCI-CTC AE 5.0

arm_group.description: single dose of Famitinib on Day 1, and co-administered with Rifampicin on Day 16

intervention.description: single dose and co-administrated with Rifampicin capsule
